column1: Little Goat Diner////+Pork Belly Croquette: Oh my gosh
column2: this was so delicious. The croquette and the smashed avocado had a really rich flavor and a mushy texture
column3: but it was perfectly balanced out by crunch and acidity of the pickled vegetables on top. There were also two runny eggs that normally I would feel slightly queasy about
column4: but I didn't even mind them at all! I would totally order this again.
